question: Who among the following ruler imposed Kharaj - o - Jaziya?
explanation: The arabs , more specifically , the Umayyad general Muhammad - bin - Qasim , introduced the Jaziya in India in 1712 AD when he conquered Sindh. In India , Islamic rulers Qutubuddin Aibak imposed Jaziya on non muslims for the first time which was called Kharaj - o - Jaziya.
